title.rendered: Follow Up Letters After an Interview

content.rendered:
Watch this quick video for great tips on follow up letters after an interview. They are more important than you think.

<iframe loading="lazy" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/B_Ngt0hU-jk" width="560" height="315" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe>

excerpt.rendered: Watch this quick video for great tips on follow up letters after an interview. They are more important than you think.
